mix.title: Sorrow-Vomit: 2021-05-09 (New Releases Live Mix: Post-Punk, Darkwave, Cold, Synth, Goth, EBM...)
mix.shortTitle: Sorrow-Vomit: 2021-05-09 (New Releases Live Mix: Post-Punk, Darkwave, Cold, Synth, Goth, EBM...)
mix.description:
Recorded live May 8, 2021. Tons of brand new tracks in the genres of Post-Punk, Darkwave, EBM, Coldwave, Minimal Synth, Gothic, Synthpop and related.

Playlist:

  • Intolerable Life - Ha! Ha! Ha!
  • Raderkraft - Greta's Speech
  • Hapax - Silvery Track
